title: On behalf of the TRUSTING GOD 4 EVERYTHING TEAM, I would like to WELCOME all of our new members. We ...

attachments.displayName:
On behalf of the TRUSTING GOD 4 EVERYTHING TEAM, I would like to WELCOME all of our new members. We are so pleased you have chosen to join our community where the focus is on learning to TRUST GOD 4 EVERYTHING. We look forward to reading and hearing about your journey with God and how you may have learned to overcome your struggles and challenges or how God has revealed Himself to you. THERE IS ONLY ONE LORD, JESUS CHRIST. He is the center of our attention. Any posts suggesting otherwise are deleted from this community. Please keep in mind that we also remove all solicitations for money and duplicate postings. We encourage all posts that exalts the name of JESUS and gives glory to God, our creator and keeper of our souls.

Again WELCOME and God bless!

object.content:
On behalf of the TRUSTING GOD 4 EVERYTHING TEAM, I would like to WELCOME all of our new members. We are so pleased you have chosen to join our community where the focus is on learning to TRUST GOD 4 EVERYTHING. We look forward to reading and hearing about your journey with God and how you may have learned to overcome your struggles and challenges or how God has revealed Himself to you. THERE IS ONLY ONE LORD, JESUS CHRIST. He is the center of our attention. Any posts suggesting otherwise are deleted from this community. Please keep in mind that we also remove all solicitations for money and duplicate postings. We encourage all posts that exalts the name of JESUS and gives glory to God, our creator and keeper of our souls.

Again WELCOME and God bless!
